history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Yes, I will be going to the airport from the Waterfront.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER I would like to go fish.
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Okay, going to roland's seafood grill. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Okay, leaving from the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh zoo and ppg aquarium. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>

TTS There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 24 minutes..
Head southeast toward Amity St..
Turn right toward Amity St..
Turn left onto Amity St..
Continue straight onto east 5th avenue..
Turn right onto Homestead Grays Bridge..
Continue onto Browns Hill Rd..
Turn right toward Beechwood Blvd..
Turn right onto Beechwood Blvd..
Turn right to stay on Beechwood Blvd..
Turn right onto Fifth avenue..
Continue onto Washington Blvd..
Continue onto Butler St..
Turn left onto Baker St. Destination will be on the left..
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
